name: Connect-four
body:
### Welcome to Connect Four Python
This game was coded in python with the use of the [pygame](http://www.pygame.org) libary. This game was orginally based off of [Connect Four by Malcolm Crum](www.apf.cloud/djmemes) with revisions pretaining to User Interface, Scoring, and core algorithms. 

### Authors and Contributors
Authors - David and Adam

### Need Help?
Hit me up on twitter (@Zethern_).
